languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс осматривает экран и приборную панель.{/n} "Одно из проявлений той же скверны, с которой мы столкнулись в системе Кьявы Гамма. Возможно, если использовать дополнительную систему подключения..."

{n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered on Kiava Gamma. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс осматривает экран и приборную панель.{/n} "Одно из проявлений той же скверны, с которой мы столкнулись в системе Кьявы Гамма. Возможно, если использовать дополнительную систему подключения..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control board a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered in the Kiava Gamma system. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

{n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control board a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered in the Kiava Gamma system. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

{n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered in the Kiava Gamma System. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

{n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered in the Kiava Gamma System. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

{n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered in the Kiava Gamma System. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

languages.text: {n}海因里希对屏幕与控制面板进行了彻底检查。{/n}“这与我们在基亚瓦伽马星遭遇的腐化是一样的，只是表现形式不同而已。如果使用辅助连接系统的话……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered on Kiava Gamma. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希对屏幕与控制面板进行了彻底检查。{/n}“这与我们在基亚瓦伽马星遭遇的腐化是一样的，只是表现形式不同而已。如果使用辅助连接系统的话……”
{n}海因里希对屏幕与控制面板进行了彻底检查。{/n}“这与我们在基亚瓦伽马星遭遇的腐化是一样的，只是表现形式不同而已。如果使用辅助连接系统的话……”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix examina concienzudamente la pantalla y el panel de control.{/n} «Es otra manifestación de la corrupción que encontramos en Kiava Gamma. Tal vez con un sistema de conexión auxiliar...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered on Kiava Gamma. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix examina concienzudamente la pantalla y el panel de control.{/n} «Es otra manifestación de la corrupción que encontramos en Kiava Gamma. Tal vez con un sistema de conexión auxiliar...».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、画面とコントロールパネルを念入りに調べた。{/n}「キアヴァ・ガンマのシステムで見たものと同じ腐敗の兆候のひとつです。補助接続システムを使えばもしかしたら…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered on Kiava Gamma. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、画面とコントロールパネルを念入りに調べた。{/n}「キアヴァ・ガンマのシステムで見たものと同じ腐敗の兆候のひとつです。補助接続システムを使えばもしかしたら…」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix untersucht Bildschirm und Bedienfeld gründlich.{/n} "Eine weitere Manifestation derselben Verderbnis, der wir schon auf Kiava Gamma begegnet sind. Vielleicht sollten wir ein zusätzliches Verbindungssystem benutzen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered on Kiava Gamma. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix untersucht Bildschirm und Bedienfeld gründlich.{/n} "Eine weitere Manifestation derselben Verderbnis, der wir schon im Kiava-Gamma-System begegnet sind. Vielleicht sollten wir ein zusätzliches Verbindungssystem benutzen ..."

{n}Heinrix untersucht Bildschirm und Bedienfeld gründlich.{/n} "Eine weitere Manifestation derselben Verderbnis, der wir schon im Kiava-Gamma-System begegnet sind. Vielleicht sollten wir ein zusätzliches Verbindungssystem benutzen ..."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix examine attentivement l'écran et le panneau de contrôle.{/n} « Il s'agit d'une autre manifestation de la corruption à laquelle nous avons déjà fait face sur Kiava Gamma. Peut-être qu'en utilisant un système de connexion auxiliaire... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered on Kiava Gamma. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix examine attentivement l'écran et le panneau de contrôle.{/n} « Il s'agit d'une autre manifestation de la corruption à laquelle nous avons déjà fait face sur Kiava Gamma. Peut-être qu'en utilisant un système de connexion auxiliaire... »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, kılı kırk yararcasına ekranla kontrol panelini inceliyor.{/n} "Kiava Gama'da karşılaştığımız yozlaşma göstergelerinin tıpatıp aynısı. Yardımcı bağlantı sistemini kullanırsak..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives the screen and the control panel a thorough examination.{/n} "Another manifestation of the same corruption we encountered on Kiava Gamma. Perhaps if we used an auxiliary connection system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, kılı kırk yararcasına ekranla kontrol panelini inceliyor.{/n} "Kiava Gama sisteminde karşılaştığımız yozlaşma göstergelerinin tıpatıp aynısı. İkincil bağlantı sistemini kullanırsak…"
